Sister Seel!"},{"lineNumber":55596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いっぱい持ってくよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll bring a lot!\""},{"lineNumber":55597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わ、そんなにいっぱい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-whoa, that’s a lot."},{"lineNumber":55598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落とさないようにね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be careful not to drop them.\""},{"lineNumber":55599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にひひ、平気平気ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nihi, it's fine, it's fine!\""},{"lineNumber":55600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ナギ、半分よこしなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nagi, give me half."},{"lineNumber":55601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も持ってくから」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll carry some too.\""},{"lineNumber":55602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーいっ、お姉様。半分こだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay, big sister. Half each!\""},{"lineNumber":55603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":55604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、どうしたコパンドン」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What's wrong, Copandon?\""},{"lineNumber":55605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやあ……ちょろっと聞いてはいたけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... I had heard a bit, but..."},{"lineNumber":55606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれが志津香はんと、ナギかぁ……ってな」","translatedEnglishLine":"so those are Shizuka-san and Nagi... I see.\""},{"lineNumber":55607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、見た事なかったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, you hadn't seen them before, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":55608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゼスの時の様子は覚えとるから、余計になぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since I remember how they were at Zeth, it's even more so.\""},{"lineNumber":55609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……確かに、あの頃は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... Indeed, back then,"},{"lineNumber":55610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　志津香もナギも、復讐の鬼って感じだったからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"both Shizuka and Nagi felt like demons of revenge.\""},{"lineNumber":55611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正直もう、いきつく所までいくしかない、って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To be honest, I thought we just had to go all the way to the end,"},{"lineNumber":55612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思ったもんやけどな……何したん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"or so I thought... What did you do?\""},{"lineNumber":55613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に。志津香の奴があれを選んだだけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nothing. Shizuka just chose that.\""},{"lineNumber":55614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...?\""},{"lineNumber":55615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、志津香の奴め……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously, that Shizuka...\""},{"lineNumber":55616,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いきなりガキの身体なんかになりおって……","translatedEnglishLine":"suddenly turned into a kid’s body like that..."},{"lineNumber":55617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手が出せんではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't even lay a hand on her now.\""},{"lineNumber":55618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっはは。ええやん、幸せそうで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha. Well, it's fine, she looks happy.\""},{"lineNumber":55619,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとコパンドンの視線の先で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the direction of Rance and Copandon's gaze,"},{"lineNumber":55620,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットを交えた三人は、","translatedEnglishLine":"the three of them including Reset,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、ガキの引率なんぞ……」
「あのね、ナギ……」
「お姉様は？　お姉様も行きたくない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How about big sister? Doesn't she want to come too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香と、振り返ったナギが、しばし見つめ合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka and Nagi, who turned around, stared at each other for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス。
自分の身は、自分で守るから……」
「甘っ！　お前、妹に甘すぎるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Too soft! You're way too lenient with your little sister!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーい！　ほらほら、いいでしょ、ランス！」
「ぐぬぬ……まあいいか」
「ほな出発しよか。魔軍に見つかりたくないさかい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let's depart. Since we don't want to be spotted by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東から大陸の南端付近を使って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll use the area near the southern tip of the continent to the east,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐるっと回りこむで」
「ッ、おーーーーーーっ！」
「了解」
志津香、ナギを加えた一行は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group including Shizuka and Nagi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジフテリアへと出発した。
一行は魔軍の勢力圏内を避け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group avoided the territories controlled by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南方へと針路を取った。
その、夕暮れ。
ランス一行は、夜営の準備でぱたぱたと動いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the group busily prepared for an overnight camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ナギちゃん、お皿持ってきて。
そろそろ、お肉が焼けるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The meat will be done grilling soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーいっ、シィルおねえちゃん！
いっぱい持ってくよー！」
「わ、わ、そんなにいっぱい。
落とさないようにね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be careful not to drop them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にひひ、平気平気ー」
「ナギ、半分よこしなさい。
私も持ってくから」
「はーいっ、お姉様。半分こだー」
「ん、どうしたコパンドン」
「いやあ……ちょろっと聞いてはいたけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... I had heard a bit, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが志津香はんと、ナギかぁ……ってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so those are Shizuka-san and Nagi... I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、見た事なかったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, you hadn't seen them before, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスの時の様子は覚えとるから、余計になぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since I remember how they were at Zeth, it's even more so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……確かに、あの頃は
志津香もナギも、復讐の鬼って感じだったからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both Shizuka and Nagi felt like demons of revenge."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直もう、いきつく所までいくしかない、って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To be honest, I thought we just had to go all the way to the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思ったもんやけどな……何したん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or so I thought... What did you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に。志津香の奴があれを選んだだけだ」
「まったく、志津香の奴め……
いきなりガキの身体なんかになりおって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suddenly turned into a kid’s body like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手が出せんではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't even lay a hand on her now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっはは。ええやん、幸せそうで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha. Well, it's fine, she looks happy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとコパンドンの視線の先で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the direction of Rance and Copandon's gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットを交えた三人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the three of them including Reset,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
